title: Merchant
content:
Merchant is a type of profession in Chapter 4: Crenopolis. The profession revolves around accepting bounties at the Merchant's Guild, purchasing the items from one NPC and delivering them to another NPC in the city. Higher levels of Merchant allow the player to receive steep discounts on Leatherworking Hides.

You can stockpile up to six Contracts, and those Contracts can be of the same delivery, so waiting at the Guild Bounty Board for a few minutes to fill your Contracts with the desired delivery route is an option.

The Guild Bounty Board refreshes every two minutes.

EXP and Money scaling can be found here, Merchant Guild Bounties XP & Values.

General Tips:


 * Watch and wait out the timer within the Guild Bounty Board menu for a chance to double up on higher value trades, or for other items that share a similar route.
 * Teleporting is often faster than walking!
 * Items can be pre-purchased and dropped on the floor until an appropriate bounty is available. Items on the ground expire after ~10 minutes.
 * Consider leveling Detective to unlock shortcuts between different rooms. After clearing a raid room, one of the rooms will stay open to become a shortcut.
 * The Battle of Fortunehold quest also rewards a shortcut between Fortunehold Farm and Meggrit's Market. Unlocking the shortcut itself does not require the full completion of the questline, nor are the skill checks for the quest required to unlock the shortcut.
